head.title: The Night Our Cable Went Dark

hedline.hl1: The Night Our Cable Went Dark

abstract.p: Susan Mullen letter on May 2 article holds Time Warner's withholding of ABC's programs shows need for competition in cable television industry

block.p: Re ''Blackout of ABC on Cable Affects Millions of Homes'' (front page, May 2):

We have been held hostage by Time Warner, which can do whatever it wants without fear of customers' deserting for another company. Time Warner's withholding of ABC's programs points out the need for competition in the cable industry. We currently have a choice of phone service, gas and electric, but not cable? That's ridiculous! If there were another choice, I would switch my service instantly.
